### Me:
 
1990s: demo scene, EOS (short-lived, doomed "game OS") project

1998-2007: Microsoft: Visual C++, C# and debugger teams

2008-present: independent software consultant
 
C, C++, Objective-C, Python, Javascript, Java, x86 assembly, etc

Linux, Un*x, Android, iOS, Mac OS X, Windows...
